definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: We all know you to be a very bashful man .
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道你是個臉皮薄的人。

sentences.english: This can chase me urgently bad, I am timid and not to love an explanation.
sentences.chinese: 這可把我急壞了，我這個人臉皮薄又不愛解釋。

definition: see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: A rabbit doesn't eat the grass by its own burrow (idiom); One shouldn't do anything to harm one's neighbors.
pinyin: tu4 zi5 bu4 chi1 wo1 bian1 cao3

definition: lit. a good horse doesn't turn around and graze the same patch again (idiom)/fig. once you've moved on, don't go back again (romantic relationship, job etc)/leave the past behind
pinyin: hao3 ma3 bu4 chi1 hui2 tou2 cao3
